query:
SELECT 
  r.name as recipe_name,
  ri.ingredientId,
  i.name as ingredient_name,
  ri.quantity,
  ri.unit as recipe_unit_id,
  i.unit as ingredient_unit_id,
  u1.name as recipe_unit_name,
  u2.name as ingredient_unit_name,
  i.costPerUnit
FROM recipes r
JOIN recipeIngredients ri ON r.id = ri.recipeId
JOIN ingredients i ON ri.ingredientId = i.id
LEFT JOIN ingredientUnits u1 ON ri.unit = u1.id
LEFT JOIN ingredientUnits u2 ON i.unit = u2.id
WHERE r.name LIKE '%Scallops Nigiri%';
